COMMON
======

**Overview**\ 
--------------

Provides common APIs of the platform driver.

This module also provides `DevHandle <devhandle.md>`__, which represents
the common data structure of the platform driver.

**Since:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------

-----
